divs: Sighting DetailsThe children were outside playing when they looked up in the southeastern skyand observed the object which most likely was a glowing blimp, but to children,it was something else. My grandaughter being one of the children 8yrs oldandvery smart and observant described a saucer like vehicle with a dome on top. However, it would be nice for all concerned, to find out what really flew overthat area on this day and approximate time.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Culver City
There were no other sightings in Culver City on or around November 10th 2003
